text:
Microsoft combines all Office applications for iPhone into one
04 Nov 2019, 17:26 by Artyom Bausov
Microsoft has released on iOS and Android a new Office application, which combines the functions of Word, Excel and Power Point.
They completely copy the capabilities of individual applications, including viewing and editing. File access is provided through the Microsoft OneDrive cloud.






You can download Office now for free. For owners of Android devices, you need to register on the Microsoft website, for iOS, download the application through TestFlight. It is still being finalized. Limited number of seats.
Microsoft? S new Office app for iOS and Android combines Word, Excel, and PowerPoint Its new mobile app is a central hub for all things Office. www.theverge.com
